explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning for predictive analytics on big stock data.

explanations.deep learning: The use of LSTM networks indicates the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions using LSTM networks in the ensemble for time-series prediction.
explanations.LSTM: The paper explicitly includes LSTM networks as one of the components in the proposed ensemble method.
